name: Contacts Quest
description:
The dastardly Oculus Sinister is up to his evil ways again and only YOU have the power to stop him! Get ready to poke some eye boogers, clear up your enemies' irritated eyes with bottles of contact solution, and take down Oculus Sinister once and for all!

Contacts Quest was created by a small team of employees at 1-800 Contacts as an experimental marketing game in the same vein as Chex Quest or Cap'n Crunch's Crunchling Adventure. Even though it was abandoned, the game remains open source and can still serve as a valuable learning resource or project starter template.

Team:

Eric Freeman - Programming

Kevin Owens - Art

Brad Schvaneveldt - Art + Voice Acting

Song: GirlStep - Hatu
